title: Pip and the Volcano
character: Pip is a small, bright orange fox with big ears and a bushy tail. Pip is brave, curious, and always ready to explore.

pages.image_prompt: Pip the fox standing on a rocky hill, looking up at a smoking volcano with wide eyes, sun setting behind, children's book illustration, bright colors, friendly, engaging, educational, no text in image

pages.text:
Sound out: hot, run, big, drip, pop, hiss, red, get
Know these: the, said, to, I, was
New words: lava, magma, crater
